title: North Shore
description: The brutal geometry and natural textures of the facade materials emphasize the modern northern character. Wide wooden roof overhangs protect the terrace and balconies from precipitation. Panoramic glazing across the entire wall maximally unites the site and the interior space, filling it with light.
The terrace with lighting and an outdoor barbecue becomes an extension of the living room, where you can spend a pleasant summer evening with family and friends.

gallery.alt: A modern A-frame house with a large gabled roof, a wood and stone facade, and expansive glass windows that reveal a cozy, well-lit interior. The home is nestled in a lush green forest.
